official.headline: Citywide Blackout
official.anchor_line: A scheduled system reset pauses all BCI-linked services across Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Planned infrastructure improvement ensures every resident benefits from the most reliable Behavioral Compliance Index. Our city adapts for collective security and efficiency.

official.headline: Communities Organize
official.anchor_line: Neighborhoods smoothly transition to manual workflows, maintaining public order and support.
official.contextual_reframing: Citizen cooperation demonstrates our flexibility. Even without digital tools, unity and discipline prevail in line with the city's traditions.

official.headline: Council Restores Order
official.anchor_line: The Central Council pledges a swift return to basic services for Stenograd.
official.contextual_reframing: Transparent governance delivers stability and continuity. Public trust in data-driven leadership ensures an efficient recovery process.

underground.headline: City Switches Off
underground.anchor_line: BCI blackout leaves Stenograd in chaos as every digital system fails.
underground.contextual_reframing: They call it a technical reset. We see neighbors locked out of basic needs while silent algorithms decide who gets left behind. The Behavioral Compliance Index judges us all without appeal.

underground.headline: People Step Up
underground.anchor_line: Without the system, locals scramble to organize food and help for each other.
underground.contextual_reframing: No Council orders, just real people making it work. These paper records mean freedom for some, fear for others. The collapse of digital control shows who really keeps Stenograd running.

underground.headline: Council Scrambles
underground.anchor_line: Council promises 'order' but power-sharing is just a desperate move to keep control.
underground.contextual_reframing: Vague announcements and new alliances can't hide that their automated rule broke down. The future of the city - and the BCI score that controls our lives - is anyone's guess now.
